Package com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.dao.implementation

Class MySQLDatabaseDAO

java.lang.Object
com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.dao.implementation.MySQLDatabaseDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseDAO
public final class MySQLDatabaseDAO extends Object implements DatabaseDAO
The MySQLDatabaseDAO class is an implementation of the DatabaseDAO interface that interacts with a MySQL database.

      Specified by:
      addFilm in interface DatabaseDAO
      Parameters:
      name - the film title
      description - the film description
      genre - the film genre
      length - the film duration
      director - the film director
      year - the film release year
      language - the film language
      country - the film country
      price - the film price
      URL - the URL of the film image

      duration - the film duration
      releaseYear - the film release year
      imageURL - the URL of the film image
      Throws:
      DatabaseDAOException - if an error occurs while adding the film
